name: The Perfect Picnic
description:
Welcome to "The perfect picnic"

In this game you follow the main character Aerin on their quest to make the most romantic and perfect date for her girlfriend Eelia.

Here you pick up different objects from the villages garden, ask for help and set everything up to their taste!

------------------------------------

Characters:

  • Aerin: MC, She/They, a hopeless romantic for their girlfriend
  • Eelia: She/Her, Aerins gilfriend, runs a florist shop
  • Uean: She/Her, Eelias mother, owns a bakery at home
  • Ueris: He/They, mayor, likes wearing dresses
  • Inea: He/Him, sells cheese and other dairy things

------------------------------------

I hope you will have fun and enjoy follow my characters through their date!
